data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Heden, Miranda Van (2017): A new species of the sandperch genus Parapercis from the Philippines (Perciformes: Pinguipedidae). Zootaxa 4341 (4): 563-569, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4341.4.7|6 occurrences
